altername_name: 筋肉番付VOL.1～俺が最強の男だ！～
name: Kinniku Banzuke Vol.1: Ore ga Saikyou no Otoko Da!
overview: Kinniku Banzuke (Muscle Ranking), an enormously popular program that aired weekly between 1995 and 2002, and Sasuke, a twice-a-year special that’s still going strong. The premise of Kinniku Banzuke, as reflected in several Muscle Park games, is simple. Competitors must knock down nine numbered plates of a target using various sports apparatus, including Frisbees, baseballs and darts. Participants on the show included top athletes and qualified amateurs. Events: Struck out Kick target Monster Box Shot-gun touch The tug-of-war Hustler Daruma Brain Panic
